text: Roy Abergil (born 27 October 1990) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a forward for FC Tucson in USL League One. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Colorado Mesa University Athletics *Profile at FC Tucson Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Football players from Beersheba Category:Israeli footballers Category:Israeli expatriate footballers Category:Maccabi Be'er Sheva F.C. players Category:F.C.
